äºŒ.å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•1.å…ƒç´ å®šä½ æ ¹æ®idå®šä½ 1driver.findElement(By.id('ID'))ï¼›//ç±»ä¼¼äºjqueryçš„$("#id") æ ¹æ®classNameå®šä½ 1driver.findElement(By.className('Class'))ï¼›//ç±»ä¼¼äºjqueryçš„$(".class") æ›´å¤šå®šä½æ–¹å¼å¯å‚è€ƒï¼šhttp://seleniumhq.github.io/selenium/docs/api/javascript/module/selenium-webdriver/index_exports_By.html 2.è®¾ç½®å…ƒç´ çš„å€¼1driver.findElement(By.id('ID')).sendKeys('value');//ç±»ä¼¼äºjqueryçš„$(".id").val("value"); 3.æ¸…ç©ºå…ƒç´ çš„å€¼1driver.findElement(By.id('id')).clear(); 4.å•å‡»æŒ‰é’®1driver.findElement(By.id('id')).click(); 5.å…ƒç´ ç­‰å¾…æœ‰æ—¶å¯¹ä¸€äº›å…ƒç´ éœ€è¦ç­‰å¾…é¡µé¢è·³è½¬æˆ–æ“ä½œå®Œæˆæ‰ä¼šæ˜¾ç¤ºï¼Œå¦‚æœæ“ä½œè€—æ—¶æˆ–è€…ç½‘ç»œåŸå› ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¯¥å…ƒç´ è¿˜æ²¡å‡ºç°å°±è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œå¯èƒ½ä¼šè·‘å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦è®¾ç½®ä¸€äº›ç­‰å¾…ï¼Œç­‰å¾…è¯¥å…ƒç´ å‡ºç°åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸Šæ—¶æ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œï¼š123var until = webdriver.until;driver.wait(until.elementLocated(By.id('id'), 10000));... 6.ç¨‹åºç¡çœ ç¡çœ åŠŸèƒ½è§£å†³çš„é—®é¢˜å’Œå…ƒç´ ç­‰å¾…ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œæ›´æ¨èä½¿ç”¨å…ƒç´ ç­‰å¾…æ–¹æ³•ã€‚1driver.sleep(500);//æ¯«ç§’ 7.æ‰§è¡ŒJavaScriptåœ¨ç½‘é¡µä¸Šè¿è¡Œä¸€æ®µjavascript,æ­¤æ–¹æ³•åœ¨seleniumçš„ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­éå¸¸æœ‰ç”¨ï¼Œå½“æœ‰äº›æ—¶å€™æŸä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ˜¯åœ¨éš¾ä»¥è·å–æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ç›´æ¥è§¦å‘è¯¥å…ƒç´ æœ¬èº«çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚æŸä¸ªæŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»åæ‰§è¡Œç½‘é¡µè·³è½¬ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬éš¾ä»¥å®šä½è¯¥å…ƒç´ æ—¶å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è·³è½¬ï¼š1driver.executeScript('location.href="/xx.html" '); æˆ–è€…éœ€è¦ç»™å…ƒç´ è®¾ç½®å€¼æ—¶å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š1driver.executeScript('document.getElementById("id").value="value"');//$("#id").val("value"); 8.æ‰§è¡ŒJavaScriptå¹¶è·å–è¿”å›å€¼åœ¨ç½‘é¡µä¸Šè¿è¡ŒJavaScriptè¿˜å¯è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œä»¥ä¾›æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªåŠ¨è¿è¡Œç¨‹åºè°ƒç”¨åšå‡ºä¸€äº›åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚å¯ä»¥æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘é¡µä¸Šçš„æŸä¸ªå€¼å¤§äº100åšæŸç§æ“ä½œï¼Œå°äº100åšå¦å¤–ä¸€ç§æ“ä½œã€‚12345678driver.executeScript('return $("#id").val()').then(function(obj){ //objå³ä¸ºè¿”å›å€¼ if(obj>100){ //æ“ä½œ }else{ //å…¶ä»–æ“ä½œ }}) 9.åˆ‡æ¢ä½œç”¨åŸŸï¼ˆswitchToï¼‰ åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°iframeç½‘é¡µä¸­å¸¸å¸¸ä¼šåµŒå…¥ä¸€äº›iframeï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯æ ‡ç­¾é¡µé¢æˆ–è€…æ˜¯å¼¹çª—çš„å½¢å¼ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯è¦æ“ä½œiframeé‡Œé¢çš„å…ƒç´ å‰å°±éœ€æŠŠå½“å‰çš„ä½œç”¨åŸŸåˆ‡æ¢åˆ°iframeï¼Œåˆ‡æ¢ååœ¨åˆ‡æ¢ä¼šä¸»é¡µé¢å‰æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ“ä½œéƒ½æ˜¯é’ˆå¯¹iframeï¼Œåœ¨iframeå†…çš„æ“ä½œç»“æŸåéœ€åˆ‡æ¢å›ä¸»é¡µé¢ã€‚ 1driver.switchTo().frame(driver.findElement(By.id("iframe-id"))); //iframe-idä¸ºiframeå…ƒç´ çš„id åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°å¼¹å‡ºæ¡†æœ‰æ—¶å€™ä¸€äº›ç½‘é¡µä¼šå¼¹å‡ºä¸€äº›æ“ä½œæç¤ºï¼Œæç¤ºæ¡†ä¼šå µå¡æ•´ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡çš„æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œéœ€å°†å…¶å…³é—­(åªé’ˆå¯¹åŸç”Ÿçš„jså¼¹å‡ºæ¡†)ã€‚ 1234567driver.switchTo().alert().then(function(alert) { //æ£€æµ‹åˆ°å¼¹å‡ºæ¡†æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œ //å…³é—­alert return alert.dismiss();},function(){ //æ²¡æœ‰æ£€æµ‹åˆ°å¼¹å‡ºæ¡†æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œ}); åˆ‡æ¢å›ä¸»é¡µé¢ 1driver.switchTo().defaultContent(); 10.ç½‘é¡µæœ€å¤§åŒ–ï¼ˆå…¨å±ï¼‰1driver.manage().window().maximize(); 11.ç½‘é¡µæˆªå›¾(å®šä½)ç½‘é¡µæˆªå›¾çœ‹ä¸Šå»å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œå°±ä¸€è¡Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š1driver.takeScreenshot()ï¼› æˆªå›¾åçš„ç»“æœä¸ºbase64æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå¯è‡ªè¡Œå¤„ç†ã€‚ç±»ä¼¼è¿™æ ·ï¼š123driver.takeScreenshot().then(function(d){ //æ­¤å¤„då³ä¸ºæˆªå›¾ç»“æœbase64å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œå¯åœ¨æ­¤è‡ªè¡Œå¤„ç†}); ä½†æ˜¯å¾€å¾€åœ¨å®é™…åº”ç”¨ä¸­å¯èƒ½æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸éœ€è¦ä¸€æ•´ä¸ªç½‘é¡µå›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å€¼éœ€è¦æŸéƒ¨åˆ†çš„å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶å€™å°±éœ€è¦æ¢ç§æ–¹å¼äº†ã€‚åœ¨ç½‘ä¸Šæ‰¾åˆ°äº†ä¸€äº›ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆå·²ä¸è®°å¾—å‡ºå¤„ï¼‰ååšäº†æ•´ç†å’Œäº²æµ‹åè®°å½•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š123456789101112131415161718driver.findElement(By.className('yanzheng')).then(function(obj){ obj.getSize().then(function(size){ obj.getLocation().then(function(loc){ driver.takeScreenshot().then(function(d){ var data={ d:d, width:size.width, height:size.height, x:loc.x, y:loc.y }; //æ­¤å¤„çœç•¥ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸¤æ­¥ //1.æäº¤dataä¿¡æ¯åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨å¤„ç†å›¾ç‰‡ //2.å…ˆæ ¹æ®dè·å–æ•´å¼ å›¾ç‰‡ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå†æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦æˆªå–çš„å…ƒç´ çš„å…¶å®ä½ç½®x,yä»¥åŠé•¿å®½width,heightæˆªå–ç›¸åº”çš„å›¾ç‰‡ }) } }}) 12.é€€å‡ºç¨‹åºï¼ˆå…³é—­ç½‘é¡µï¼‰1driver.quit(); æ›´å¤šè¯¦ç»†æ–‡æ¡£å¯å‚è€ƒå®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ï¼šhttp://seleniumhq.github.io/selenium/docs/api/javascript/module/selenium-webdriver/

ä½¿æŒ‰é’®è¢«éšè—*/.item-container{width:100%;padding:0.5rem;background-color: #fff;display: flex;align-items: center;height: 3.5rem}.item-container img{height: 3.5rem;width: 3.5rem;background:transparent url(resource/allow_right.png) no-repeat;background-size:1.5rem 1.5rem;background-position: center}.action-delete{background:#C95454}.action-edit{background:#00BCD4}/*-webkit-transition:all 0.3s linear;transition:all 0.3s linear;ä½¿æµè§ˆå™¨å‡ºç°æ»‘åŠ¨æ•ˆæœwidth: 140%;å†…å®¹å 100% ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‰é’®å„å 20% ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æŒ‰é’®æ•°é‡å’Œå®½åº¦è°ƒæ•´*/.swipe-container{ margin-bottom:0.5rem;width: 140%;display: flex;-webkit-transition:all 0.3s linear;transition:all 0.3s linear;}/*width:20%; å’Œswipe-container width: 140%;ç›¸å¯¹åº”*/.swipe-container .action{width:20%;text-align:center;color:#fff;padding:0.5rem 0;line-height: 3.5rem;}/*ä½¿å…ƒç´ å‘å·¦æ»‘åŠ¨ä¹‹åæ˜¾ç¤ºè¢«éšè—çš„æŒ‰é’® æ­¤å¤„ä¸çŸ¥é“åŸç† å†™40%ä¸è¡Œ å¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯å› ä¸ºæ­¤å¤„çš„å®½åº¦æ˜¯ä»¥swipe-containerçš„æ€»å®½åº¦ä¸º100%æ¥è®¡ç®—ï¼ŒæŒ‰é’®çš„å®½åº¦20%åˆ™æ—¶ä»¥ç½‘é¡µçš„å®½åº¦ä¸º100%æ¥è®¡ç®—çš„ï¼Œå³ ï¼š100*(20%)=140*(14.25%)æ ¹æ®æŒ‰é’®æ•°é‡å’Œå®½åº¦è°ƒæ•´*/.swipeleft{transform:translateX(-28.5%);-webkit-transform:translateX(-28.5%);} 3.JSå®ç°1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283 window.onload=function(){ setSlide(); var elems=document.getElementsByClassName("action-delete"); for(var i=0;i<elems.length;i++){ elems[i].addEventListener("click", function(){ var r=confirm("ç¡®å®šè¦åˆ é™¤è¯¥è®°å½•å—?") if (r){ alert("å‘µå‘µå‘µ"); }else{ alert("å“ˆå“ˆå“ˆ"); } }); } }; function setSlide() { //ä¾§æ»‘æ˜¾ç¤ºåˆ é™¤æŒ‰é’® var expansion = null; //æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨å±•å¼€çš„list var container = document.querySelectorAll(".swipe-container"); for (var i = 0; i < container.length; i++) { var x, y, X, Y, swipeX, swipeY; container[i].addEventListener('touchstart', function (event) { x = event.changedTouches[0].pageX; y = event.changedTouches[0].pageY; swipeX = true; swipeY = true; if (expansion) { //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å±•å¼€ //å¦‚æœå±•å¼€åˆ™æ”¶èµ· ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç å–æ¶ˆæ³¨é‡Šååˆ™æ»‘åŠ¨å¼€å§‹ç«‹å³æ”¶èµ· æ³¨é‡Šååˆ™å‘å³æ»‘åŠ¨ä¸€å®šè·ç¦»åæ”¶èµ·éšè—æŒ‰é’® //æ–¹æ³•ä¸€. //removeClass(this,"swipeleft"); //æ–¹æ³•äºŒ éœ€å¼•å…¥jquery //$(this).removeClass("swipeleft"); } }); container[i].addEventListener('touchmove', function (event) { X = event.changedTouches[0].pageX; Y = event.changedTouches[0].pageY; // å·¦å³æ»‘åŠ¨ if (swipeX && Math.abs(X - x) - Math.abs(Y - y) > 0) { // é˜»æ­¢äº‹ä»¶å†’æ³¡ event.stopPropagation(); if (X - x > 10) { //å³æ»‘æ”¶èµ· event.preventDefault(); removeClass(this,"swipeleft"); //$(this).removeClass("swipeleft"); } if (x - X > 10) { //å·¦æ»‘å±•å¼€ event.preventDefault(); //$(this).addClass("swipeleft"); addClass(this,"swipeleft"); expansion = this; } swipeY = false; } // ä¸Šä¸‹æ»‘åŠ¨ if (swipeY && Math.abs(X - x) - Math.abs(Y - y) < 0) { swipeX = false; } }); }}function hasClass(elem, cls) { cls = cls || ''; if (cls.replace(/\s/g, '').length == 0) return false; return new RegExp(' ' + cls + ' ').test(' ' + elem.className + ' '); } function addClass(ele, cls) { if (!hasClass(ele, cls)) { ele.className = ele.className == '' ? cls : ele.className + ' ' + cls; } } function removeClass(ele, cls) { if (hasClass(ele, cls)) { var newClass = ' ' + ele.className.replace(/[\t\r\n]/g, '') + ' '; while (newClass.indexOf(' ' + cls + ' ') >= 0) { newClass = newClass.replace(' ' + cls + ' ', ' '); } ele.className = newClass.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, ''); } } posts.text: å‰è¨€ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨åšç½‘é¡µæ—¶ç»å¸¸ä¼šéœ€è¦æœ‰ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯é€‰æ‹©å›¾ç‰‡æˆ–è€…æ‹ç…§ä¸Šä¼ ï¼Œå¦‚æœç®€å•çš„ä½¿ç”¨ input type=â€fileâ€ è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼è™½ç„¶ä¹Ÿèƒ½å®ç°åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä½†ç”¨æˆ·ä½“éªŒä¸Šå¯èƒ½ä¼šå·®äº†ä¸€äº›ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ¬æ–‡è®°å½•äº†ä½¿ç”¨css+jså®ç°å›¾ç‰‡é€‰ä¸­åçš„é¢„è§ˆåŠå‹ç¼©ä¸Šä¼ åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œéƒ¨åˆ†å¸¦æ¥æ¥æºäºç½‘ç»œï¼Œæ­¤å¤„åšäº†è®°å½•æ•´ç†ã€‚ æ•ˆæœé¢„è§ˆï¼š 1.åˆ›å»ºindex.html12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940<!DOCTYPE html><html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no"> <title>æ‹ç…§ä¸Šä¼ </title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="index.css"/> <script type='text/javascript' src='index.js' charset='utf-8'></script> </head> <body> <form id="mainForm"> <div class="content"> <div class="label">èº«ä»½è¯</div> <div class="img-area"> <div class="container"> <input type="file" id='id-face' name='face' accept="image/*" /> <div id='face-empty-result'> <img style='width:4rem' src="https://github.com/wangheng3751/my-resources/blob/master/images/camera.png?raw=true" alt=""> <p>èº«ä»½è¯æ­£é¢ç…§</p> </div> <img style='width: 100%' id='face-result'/> </div> <div class="container" style='margin-top:0.5rem;'> <input type="file" id='id-back' name='back' accept="image/*" /> <div id='back-empty-result'> <img style='width:4rem' src="https://github.com/wangheng3751/my-resources/blob/master/images/camera.png?raw=true" alt=""> <p>èº«ä»½è¯åé¢ç…§</p> </div> <img style='width: 100%' id='back-result'/> </div> </div> </div> <div class="btn"> æäº¤ </div> </form> </body></html> 2.åˆ›å»ºindex.css123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748body{ margin: 0}.content{ padding:0.5rem; display: flex; align-items: center; border-bottom: 1px #999 solid}.label{ width:5rem;}.img-area{ flex:1}.container{ background-color:#e7e7e7; position: relative;}.container div{ text-align: center; padding:0.5rem 0}.container input{ opacity:0; filter:alpha(opacity=0); height: 100%; width: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 9;}.container p{ font-size: 0.9rem; color:#999}.btn{ background-color: #4363ab; color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; width:80%; border-radius: 0.2rem; margin: 2rem auto; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1.2rem} 3.åˆ›å»ºindex.js12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182window.onload=function(){ document.getElementById("id-face").addEventListener("change", function(){ onFileChange(this,"face-result","face-empty-result") }); document.getElementById("id-back").addEventListener("change", function(){ onFileChange(this,"back-result","back-empty-result") }); document.getElementsByClassName("btn")[0].addEventListener("click", function(){ submit(); });};/** * é€‰ä¸­å›¾ç‰‡æ—¶çš„å¤„ç† * @param {*} fileObj input fileå…ƒç´  * @param {*} el //é€‰ä¸­åç”¨äºæ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾ç‰‡çš„å…ƒç´ ID * @param {*} btnel //æœªé€‰ä¸­å›¾ç‰‡æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„æŒ‰é’®åŒºåŸŸID */function onFileChange(fileObj,el,btnel){ var windowURL = window.URL || window.webkitURL; var dataURL; var imgObj = document.getElementById(el); document.getElementById(btnel).style.display="none"; imgObj.style.display="block"; if (fileObj && fileObj.files && fileObj.files[0]) { dataURL = windowURL.createObjectURL(fileObj.files[0]); imgObj.src=dataURL; } else { dataURL = fileObj.value; imgObj.style.filter = "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.AlphaImageLoader(sizingMethod=scale)"; imgObj.filters.item("DXImageTransform.Microsoft.AlphaImageLoader").src = dataURL; }}/** * å°†å›¾ç‰‡å‹ç¼©åè¿”å›base64æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ® * @param {*} image imgå…ƒç´  * @param {*} width å‹ç¼©åå›¾ç‰‡å®½åº¦ * @param {*} height å‹ç¼©åå›¾ç‰‡é«˜åº¦ * @param {*} qua //å›¾ç‰‡è´¨é‡1-100 */function compressImageTobase64(image,width,height,qua){ var quality = qua ? qua / 100 : 0.8; var canvas = document.createElement("canvas"), ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); var w = image.naturalWidth, h = image.naturalHeight; canvas.width = width||w; canvas.height = height||h; ctx.drawImage(image, 0, 0, w, h, 0, 0, width||w, height||h); var data = canvas.toDataURL("image/jpeg", quality); return data;}//æäº¤function submit(){ //1ã€formæäº¤ //document.getElementById("mainForm").submit(); //2ã€å‹ç¼©åajaxæäº¤ var face_data=compressImageTobase64(document.getElementById("face-result"),200,100,90); var back_data=compressImageTobase64(document.getElementById("back-result"),200,100,90); var formData = new FormData(); formData.append("face",face_data); formData.append("back",back_data); //éœ€å¼•å…¥jQuery $.ajax({ url:"/åœ°å€", type: 'POST', cache: false, data: formData, timeout:180000, processData: false, contentType: false, success:function(r){ }, error:function(r){ } });} æ‰«ä¸€æ‰«é¢„è§ˆæ•ˆæœ æºç è·å–ï¼šGithubåœ°å€

Studio ä¸­å¯è§†åŒ–è®¾è®¡ï¼‰ï¼ <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="#fff" android:paddingBottom="15dp"> <TextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="#fff" android:gravity="center" android:padding="5dp" android:text="æ¸©é¦¨æç¤º" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="#f18518" /> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0.5dp" android:background="#f18518"> </View> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceSmall" android:text="æ‚¨çš„æç¤ºä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒåæœŸä»jsç«¯ä¼ å…¥ï¼" android:id="@+id/text_msg" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColor="#000" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginLeft="25dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:layout_marginRight="25dp" android:layout_marginBottom="15dp" /> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="30dp" android:orientation="horizontal"> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_cancel" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="#FDEEDF" android:text="å–æ¶ˆ" android:textColor="#f08519" android:topRightRadius="20dp" android:textSize="15sp" android:layout_marginLeft="25dp" android:layout_marginRight="5dp" /> <View android:layout_width="10dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#fff"> </View> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_comfirm" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="#f08519" android:textColor="#fff" android:text="ç¡®å®š" android:textSize="15sp" android:layout_marginLeft="5dp" android:layout_marginRight="25dp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> äºŒã€æ·»åŠ Moudleç±»è¯¥ç±»ä¸ºå·²è®¾è®¡çš„å¼¹å‡ºæ¡†æä¾›æä¾›React-Nativeè°ƒç”¨å…¥å£ã€‚ package com.xxx.xxx;//æ‚¨çš„åŒ…å import android.app.Activity; import android.app.AlertDialog; import android.content.Context; import android.content.Intent; import android.os.Bundle; import android.support.annotation.Nullable; import android.util.DisplayMetrics; import android.view.View; import android.view.Window; import android.view.WindowManager; import android.widget.Button; import android.widget.TextView; import com.facebook.react.bridge.Callback; import com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactApplicationContext; import com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactContextBaseJavaModule; import com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactMethod; import com.facebook.react.modules.core.DeviceEventManagerModule; public class xxxModule extends ReactContextBaseJavaModule { private AlertDialog dialog=null; private static ReactApplicationContext mRAC; public xxxModule(ReactApplicationContext reactContext) { super(reactContext); mRAC=reactContext; } @Override public String getName() { return "xxxModule"; } @Override public boolean canOverrideExistingModule() { return true; } //å¼¹å‡ºç¡®è®¤å–æ¶ˆæŒ‰é’®æ¡† @ReactMethod public void openConfirm(String message,String title, final Callback okBtnBack,final Callback cancelBack) { if (message == null || message.equals("")) return; Activity activity=getCurrentActivity(); AlertDialog.Builder builder = new AlertDialog.Builder(activity); View view = View.inflate(activity, R.layout.my_dialog, null); builder.setView(view); builder.setCancelable(true); if (title != null && !title.equals("")) { TextView tit= (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.title);//è®¾ç½®æ ‡é¢˜ tit.setText(title); } TextView input_edt= (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.text_msg);//æ˜¾ç¤ºå†…å®¹ input_edt.setText(message); //å–æ¶ˆæŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶ Button btn_cancel=(Button)view.findViewById(R.id.btn_cancel);//å–æ¶ˆæŒ‰é’® btn_cancel.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener(){ @Override public void onClick(View v) { if(dialog!=null) dialog.dismiss(); if(cancelBack!=null ) cancelBack.invoke(); } }); //ç¡®å®šæŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶ Button btn_comfirm=(Button)view.findViewById(R.id.btn_comfirm);//ç¡®å®šæŒ‰é’® btn_comfirm.setOnClickListener( new View.OnClickListener(){ @Override public void onClick(View v) { if(dialog!=null) dialog.dismiss(); if(okBtnBack!=null ) okBtnBack.invoke(); } } ); dialog = builder.create(); dialog.setCancelable(false); dialog.show(); //è®¾ç½®å¼¹å‡ºæ¡†å®½åº¦ Window dialogWindow = dialog.getWindow(); WindowManager.LayoutParams lp = dialogWindow.getAttributes(); WindowManager m =activity.getWindowManager(); DisplayMetrics metrics = new DisplayMetrics(); m.getDefaultDisplay().getMetrics(metrics); lp.width = (int) (metrics.widthPixels * 0.8);//å®½åº¦ //lp.height = (int) (metrics.heightPixels * 0.8);//é«˜åº¦ dialogWindow.setAttributes(lp); } //å…³é—­ç¡®è®¤å–æ¶ˆæŒ‰é’®æ¡† @ReactMethod public void closeConfirm(){ if(dialog!=null) dialog.dismiss(); } } ä¸‰ã€é€šè¿‡Packageç±»æ³¨å†ŒMoudleæ–¹æ³• å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰åˆ™åˆ›å»ºxxxPackageç±» Packageå¯ç”¨äºç®¡ç†æ‰€æœ‰çš„åŸç”Ÿæ¨¡å—çš„æ³¨å†Œã€‚ package com.xxxxx.xxxx;//æ‚¨çš„åŒ…å import com.facebook.react.ReactPackage; extends JavaScriptModule>> createJSModules() { return Collections.emptyList(); } @Override public List<ViewManager> createViewManagers(ReactApplicationContext reactContext) { return modules.add(new xxxModule(reactContext));//æ‚¨çš„Moudle return modules; } } å››ã€åœ¨MainApplicationä¸­æ³¨å†Œprotected List<ReactPackage> getPackages() { return Arrays.<ReactPackage>asList( ...,//å…¶ä»–åŒ… new xxxPackage() //æ‚¨åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ä¸­åˆ›å»ºæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨çš„Packageç±» ); } äº”ã€å‰ç«¯(React-Native)è°ƒç”¨var xxxModule = NativeModules.xxxModule;//xxxModuleä¸ºç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ä¸­çš„Moudleç±»ä¸­çš„getNameæ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼ xxxModule .openConfirm("æç¤ºä¿¡æ¯","æ ‡é¢˜",()=>{ //â€œç¡®è®¤â€æŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³• },()=>{ //â€œå–æ¶ˆâ€æŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³• });
